__comment: This file generated automatically with Patchouli.js. All changes will be rewritten
name: A Getting Started

pages.title: Wood
pages.text: You get plenty with the first quest. Use excavator modifier as explained in the quest book. Dark oak trees are great.

pages.title: Saplings
pages.text: Use TC crooks to get different kinds of saplings.

pages.title: Water
pages.text: Crush cacti in crushing tub, or fill barrels with rain. You can use bowls or a clay bucket to carry water, but be careful with the bowl!

pages.title: Dirt
pages.text: Compost greens in barrels. Sugar cane on IC2 crops is great for larger quantities.

pages.title: Rocks
pages.text: Sieve dirt to get pebbles, craft them into cobble, andesite, diorite, granite.

pages.title: Fire
pages.text: Break wooden plank slab with stick.

pages.title: Charcoal
pages.text: To craft a furnace, you need (char)coal. Use Forestry wood piles: surround it with dirt from all directions but top, place fire on top, then place dirt in place of fire. After a few minutes the burning is over and you can collect charcoal and ash.

pages.title: Iron
pages.text: As said in the quest book, you can use ironwood. Crush ironberries in the crushing tub to get iron juice, then put the juice to drying basin to get iron ore piece, and combine them into iron ore.

pages.title: Smeltery fuel
pages.text: For starters, use canola oil. Get it by growing canola and crushing it in a crushing tub.

pages.title: Blaze
pages.text: Sieve sand to obtain cinderpearl seeds. Place them on sand to grow and craft blaze from them.

pages.title: Lava
pages.text: Squeeze blaze in Integrated Dynamics squeezer.
